38 #define FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(RET, OP) \
39  friend RET operator OP (const Tick &t1, const Tick &t2); \
40  friend RET operator OP (const Tick &t1, long int t2); \
41  friend RET operator OP (long int t1, const Tick &t2); \
42  friend RET operator OP (const Tick &t1, int t2); \
43  friend RET operator OP (int t1, const Tick &t2)
44 
45 #define FRIEND_DECL_ASYMM_OPS(RET, OP) \
46  friend RET operator OP (const Tick &t1, long int t2); \
47  friend RET operator OP (const Tick &t1, int t2)
48 
49 
50 #define IMPL_SYMM_OPS(RET, OP) \
51  inline RET operator OP(const Tick &t1, const Tick &t2) { \
52  return t1.v OP t2.v; \
53  } \
54  inline RET operator OP(const Tick &t1, long int t2) { \
55  return t1.v OP t2; \
56  } \
57  inline RET operator OP(const Tick &t1, int t2) { \
58  return t1.v OP t2; \
59  } \
60  inline RET operator OP(long int t1, const Tick &t2) { \
61  return t1 OP t2.v; \
62  } \
63  inline RET operator OP(int t1, const Tick &t2) { \
64  return t1 OP t2.v; \
65  }
66 
67 #define IMPL_ASYMM_OPS(RET, OP) \
68  inline RET operator OP(const Tick &t1, long int t2) { \
69  return t1.v OP t2; \
70  } \
71  inline RET operator OP(const Tick &t1, int t2) { \
72  return t1.v OP t2; \
73  }

75 namespace MetaSim {
76 
77  using namespace std;

79  DECL_EXC(NegativeTickException, "Tick");
80 
104  class Tick {
105  public:
106  typedef int64_t impl_t;
107  typedef enum {nanosec = 1, microsec = 1000, millisec = 1000000, sec = 1000000000} unit_t;
108  private:
109  impl_t v; // value
110 
111  static impl_t resolution;
112  static unit_t default_unit;
113 
114  public:
115  Tick() { v = 0; }
116 // #if __WORDSIZE == 64
117 // Tick(long long int t) { v = t; }
118 // #endif
119  Tick(impl_t t) { v = t; }
120  Tick(int t) { v = t; }
121 
123  Tick(const std::string &s);
124 
126  explicit Tick(double t) { v = (impl_t) t; }
127 
130  #define xx_round(dbl) dbl >= 0.0 ? (int)(dbl + 0.5) : ((dbl - (double)(int)dbl) <= -0.5 ? (int)dbl : (int)(dbl - 0.5))
131  static Tick round(double t) { Tick q; q.v = (impl_t) xx_round(t); return q; }
132 
134  static Tick ceil(double t) { Tick q; q.v = (impl_t) ::ceil(t); return q; }
135 
137  static Tick floor(double t) { Tick q; q.v = (impl_t) ::floor(t); return q; }
138 
139  // default assignment operator and copy constructor
140 
141  Tick& operator+=(const Tick &t) { v += t.v; return *this; }
142  Tick& operator-=(const Tick &t) { v -= t.v; return *this; }
143 
144  Tick& operator*=(long int t) { v *= t; return *this; }
145  Tick& operator/=(long int t) { v /= t; return *this; }
146 
148  Tick& operator++() { v++; return *this; }
150  Tick operator++(int) { v++; return Tick(v-1); }
151 
153  Tick& operator--() { v++; return *this; }
155  Tick operator--(int) { v--; return Tick(v+1); }
156 
157  // automatic conversion to double
158  operator double() const { return (double) v; }
160  operator long int () const { return v; }
162  operator int () const { return (int)v; }
163 
164  static void set_default_unit(Tick::unit_t d) { default_unit = d; }
165 
167  static void set_resolution(const std::string &t) throw (parse_util::ParseExc);
168 
169  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, <);
170  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, <=);
171  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, ==);
172  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, !=);
173  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, >=);
174  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(bool, >);
175 
176  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(Tick, *);
177  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(Tick, +);
178  FRIEND_DECL_SYMM_OPS(Tick, -);
179 
180  FRIEND_DECL_ASYMM_OPS(Tick, /);

182  friend Tick operator-(const Tick &t);
183 
184  friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const Tick &t1);
185  friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream& is, Tick &t1);
186  };

201  inline Tick operator-(const Tick &t) { return Tick(-t.v); }
